wikipedia_page.main: Keith William Granger (born 5 October 1968) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League as a goalkeeper for Southampton and Darlington.He made his League debut for Southampton at 17, but played for them only twice before moving on to Darlington. Injury ended his League career after 25 appearances, although he was able to play on in non-league football until further injury forced his retirement at the age of 25. He later went into coaching.
